description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nArachnophobia:
Enemies with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SNARED} take 100% more damage from their {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_POISON} debuffs. When they break free, they take damage equal to 5 turns of their {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_POISON} debuffs. This trait does not stack.
name: Woolly Mandible
